CV

Source: R/cv.R
CV.Rd

CV Class

Format

An R6Class generator object

integer [optional]

label

character

full_name

character

character

character

Method new()

Create a CV

Usage

CV$new(label, full_name, version, uri, id = NULL, ...)

Arguments

label

CV label.

full_name

CV full name.

version

CV version.

uri

URI to external CV.

id

URI id.

...

local optional variable arguments

Usage

list object.

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

CV$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
